call_title: Ergo PoW Blockchain - Weekly Update & AMA - June 12th

topics.title: Ergo Community Meetup Event Planning
topics.summary: Discussion of organizing an Ergo community meetup with speakers including MiGoreng, qx(), and Allison. The event aims to cover development in the ecosystem, security assumptions, and project fundamentals with lower barriers to entry than typical crypto conferences.

topics.title: Rosen Bridge Expansion to New Chains
topics.summary: Updates on Rosen Bridge integration with Runes and Dogecoin, facing infrastructure challenges with Doge nodes and explorers. Discussion of expanding to other chains like Zano and Kaspa, emphasizing Rosen's unique feature of providing unilateral access to both network coins and tokens.

topics.title: Rosen Bridge Incentive Structure and Scaling
topics.summary: Proposal for creating incentive alignment for Rosen Bridge maintenance through percentage-based fees on outbound transactions and Paideia DAO structures. Discussion of scaling challenges and creating external support for maintenance as more chains are added.

topics.title: Centralized Exchange Listing Challenges
topics.summary: Critique of centralized exchange listing practices, highlighting challenges for fair-launch proof-of-work projects. Discussion of how exchanges prioritize meme coins over legitimate projects and the opaque security assumptions of centralized platforms.

topics.title: DeFi Growth vs Centralized Exchange Volume
topics.summary: Analysis of how transaction volume has shifted from centralized exchanges to DEXes over the past five years, with DEX growth significantly outpacing centralized exchange internal volume.

topics.title: Oracle Pools and Watcher Participation
topics.summary: Discussion of Ergo's unique infrastructure products like Oracle pools and Rosen Bridge where community members can earn tokens by running software. Emphasis on the undervalued nature of this participation model and the need for more promotion from watchers.

topics.title: Stable Coin Strategy and Risks
topics.summary: Explanation of why Rosen Bridge avoids centralized stable coins due to freeze/seize risks. Discussion of the contradiction in claiming 1:1 backing when foundations can freeze assets at any time based on external pressures.

topics.title: Dexy USD and Oracle Pool Updates
topics.summary: Plans for launching Dexy Gold and potentially Dexy USD, with upcoming calls about Dexy lithium and silver. Discussion of Oracle 2.0 implementation and whether to update existing pools or create new ones.

topics.title: Meetup Hybrid Event Planning Details
topics.summary: Detailed planning for hybrid event structure with streaming capabilities for remote participants. Plans to include developers like DuckPools through online presentations between in-person activities like hikes and meals.

topics.title: Ergo Node 6.0 Release Progress
topics.summary: Status update on Ergo node version 6.0 release, including recent consensus bug fixes and planned activation dates around June 25th to July 1st. Discussion of sub-blocks deployment to public testnet and security formalization needs.

topics.title: Sigma Chains Refactoring and Sidechains
topics.summary: Publication of sigma chains refactoring plan showing relatively simple path to merge-mined sidechains. Discussion of scaling considerations and development organization for application-specific chains.

topics.title: Ergoversary Anniversary Plans and US Access
topics.summary: Announcement of Ergoversary on July 1st with planned videos. Update on US Fiat Unwrap raffle progress with 15,000 ERG collected and call for more community participation from those requesting US access.

topics.title: Dogecoin Technical Integration Challenges
topics.summary: Technical explanation of Dogecoin integration difficulties related to data collection and blockchain scraping rather than the underlying protocol. The infrastructure around Doge has strict rate limits making data extraction challenging.

topics.title: ERG vs Rosen Token Market Cap Discussion
topics.summary: Analysis of ERG being undervalued relative to execution quality and research. Discussion of focus on execution over marketing and the potential for Ergo's stablecoins to expand into other ecosystems as centralized stables become more regulated.

topics.title: Rosen Bridge Liquidity Strategy
topics.summary: Discussion of Rosen Bridge liquidity development focusing on wallet integrations and dApp partnerships. Emphasis on execution-first approach rather than seeking large fund liquidity, with potential for supporting privacy coins like Monero.

topics.title: Token Security and Storage Rent Economics
topics.summary: Explanation of how high token market caps actually enhance Ergo security through storage rent mechanisms. Discussion of how Ergo's unique demurrage component differentiates it from other blockchains in security budget calculations.

topics.title: Application-Specific Chains and Regulation
topics.summary: Discussion of US regulatory changes potentially incentivizing app-specific chains and the advantages of proof-of-work fair launch models. Plans for easily deployable merge-mined sidechains that could add to Ergo's security budget.
